quotes.quote: Too many have dispensed with generosity in order to practice charity.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: One of the serious obstacles to the improvement of our race is indiscriminate charity.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The best thing to give to your enemy is forgiveness; to an opponent, tolerance; to a friend, your heart; to your child, a good example; to a father, deference; to your mother, conduct that will make her proud of you; to yourself, respect; to all men, charity.
quotes.author: Francis Maitland Balfour

quotes.quote: The living need charity more than the dead.
quotes.author: George Arnold

quotes.quote: Charity sees the need not the cause.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: In charity there is no excess.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Be charitable before wealth makes thee covetous.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: The charity that hastens to proclaim its good deeds, ceases to be charity, and is only pride and ostentation.
quotes.author: William Hutton
